Package com.dca.checkers.model

Class GameManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • com.dca.checkers.model.GameManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    public class GameManager
extends java.lang.Thread
    The GameManager represents a sort of referee for a Checker game. It is the joint point between the UI and logic part of the application and it runs on its dedicated thread.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • handleBoardClick

        public void handleBoardClick​(java.awt.Point sel)
        Handles a click performed on the board. If the current player is not human, this method does nothing. Otherwise, current human player is infomed about the event.
        Parameters:
        sel - the selected point on the board.
